page.title: 16PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: There is a Parish Council in the village for which elections are held every two years. There are six elected members with one member acting as the clerk and another as chairman. They meet in the village hall once a month and sometimes more frequently if there is something important happening. The most important thing they have done recently was to persuade the County Council to cut down the high bank by Lakes corner so that people can see what is coming round the corner and then it is safer. They have also rebuilt the bridge by the Brewery to prevent flooding.
